article_title: Fears for Gazans as aid groups halt work over air strike
sentence: They  also  assert  that  this  was  not  an  isolated  incident,  with  196  Palestinian  aid  workers  reportedly  killed  since  the  war  began  in  October.

article_title: Fears for Gazans as aid groups halt work over air strike
sentence: It  said  the  charity's  logistics  co-ordinator  and  his  son  had  been  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  in  Deir  al-Balah  in  March,  despite  the  fact  that  the  co-ordinates  of  the  shelter  where  they  were  staying  had  been  provided  to  the  Israeli  military.

article_title: Fears for Gazans as aid groups halt work over air strike
sentence: For  the  people  of  Gaza,  the  suspension  of  WCK's  operations  "means  more  famine,  more  dead  children,  more  epidemic  disease  because  people  are  so  malnourished",  Mr  Egeland  warned.

article_title: Fears for Gazans as aid groups halt work over air strike
sentence: At  least  27  children  are  reported  to  have  died  as  a  result  of  malnutrition  since  October,  according  to  the  World  Health  Organization.
